tag_professor: Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: While Mr. Mahoney is very good at what he does he is not good when it comes to following his own rules and treating everyone equally. He played extreme favoritism and graded you according to how well he liked you. In short it pays to suck up to him. Very disappointed in this instructor.
